thread.title: Jurgen Klopp insists Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is fast becoming complete midfielder at Anfield
thread.title_full: Jurgen Klopp insists Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is fast becoming complete midfielder at Anfield

author: David Maddock
title: Jurgen Klopp insists Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is fast becoming complete midfielder at Anfield
text:
Sport Jurgen Klopp insists Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is fast becoming complete midfielder at Anfield The Liverpool manager has transformed his Dutch international midfielder from an attacking threat, into an all-rounder who can take control of a game Share Klopp celebrates with Wijnaldum (Photo: Clive Brunskill) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jurgen Klopp is convinced his big-money summer signing Georginio Wijnaldum is fast becoming the complete midfielder. 
The Liverpool manager has transformed his Dutch international midfielder from a talented - if erratic - attacking threat, into an all-rounder who can take control of a game. 
Wijnaldum ousted Emre Can from the Reds midfield for the game against Spurs a fortnight ago, and responded with a performance that his boss believes is the sign of a top class player in the making. 
Asked about axing Can for Wijnaldum, Klopp said: “It was not the easiest decision of my life because it was not too long ago that Emre was outstanding against Chelsea and in Hull. The midfielder during training (Photo: Andrew Powell) Georginio Wijnaldum in action (Photo: Rex Features) 
“But in this game Georginio showed a really good combination of an aggressive, defensive midfielder plus a creative, offensive midfield player. 
“We then have all of them available at a high level and I have to take the decision. He has been really good for us, and he has formed a good partnership with Jordan Henderson. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
